TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ParserError extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示剖析器 (Parser) 錯誤或警告。

span.span: Represents a parser error or warning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件表示時，會建立錯誤擲回例外狀況。A object represents an error that is created when an exception is thrown. 剖析器錯誤物件可以包含錯誤訊息文字、 發生錯誤，檔案的虛擬路徑和該檔案中的錯誤訊息的後續的行號。A parser error object can contain error message text, a virtual path to the file where the error occurred, and the subsequent line number of the error in that file. 如果一個以上的剖析器錯誤或您想要儲存在集中位置，使用的多個剖析器錯誤物件。If more than one parser error occurs or you want to store multiple parser errors in a centralized location, use the object. 剖析器錯誤是型別。A parser error is of the type . 如需有關例外狀況，以及如何處理它們的詳細資訊，請移至[MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information on exceptions and how to handle them, go to [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增到新的剖析器錯誤物件。The following code example demonstrates how to add a new parser error to a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/CS/ParserErrorCollection_CS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/VB/ParserErrorCollection_VB.aspx#3)]

The line number of the error source.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤文字、虛擬路徑和來源行號，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified error text, virtual path, and source line number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式來初始化使用自訂設定的物件。Use the constructor to initialize a object with custom settings. 建構函式具有下列屬性：The constructor has the following properties: - 屬性，這是字串，包含剖析器錯誤相關的錯誤訊息。The property, which is a string containing the error message that is related to the parser error. - 屬性，這是唯讀的字串，指定包含剖析器錯誤之檔案的虛擬路徑。The property, which is a read-only string that specifies the virtual path of the file that contains the parser error. - 屬性，此檔案點數 whichis 列物件擲回。The property, whichis the line number within the file at which this object was thrown.

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，表示 物件的錯誤。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that represents the error for the object.
A string containing the error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來提供程式設計人員定義的錯誤訊息，剖析器中顯示的錯誤物件。Use the property to provide a programmer-defined error message for parser errors for display in a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以填入屬性物件。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the property for a object.
